examples.example: 我们都向往自由的生活，能去追寻自己的梦想。

translate.english: We all yearn for a free life and can pursue our own dreams.

examples.example: 孩子们在广阔的草原上自由地奔跑嬉戏，脸上洋溢着快乐的笑容。

translate.english: Children run and play freely on the vast prairie, with happy smiles on their faces.

examples.example: 鸟儿在广阔的天空中自由地翱翔，展现着生命的活力。

translate.english: Birds soar freely in the vast sky, showing the vitality of life.
